scripts.help: Available names: clean, lint, lint:fix, format:prettier, test, dev, start:prod, build, start
scripts.main: concurrently --kill-others "cd server && npm run $npm_config_name" "cd client && npm run $npm_config_name"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm run pre-start && npm run main --name=start
